title: Bad video calling
text: I’m getting a lot of dropped video calls. Attempted to call or make contact with Meta but no customer service to help. 1 star

title: Said I was a spammer when adding one person to a chat
text: I added one friend to a chat thread, and I was flagged as a spammer. This also happened when I was traveling overseas, and WhatsApp was the primary source of communication between myself and my schoolmates. The app left me vulnerable and without important communications for over 24 hours while it reviewed my request to not be labeled as a spammer.

title: Feature Request (Focus Modes)
text:
Can we have Focus Modes? So we can switch between modes like: work, home, squad, school etc. Sometimes you want to focus on just work for a while but other chats (that you can’t afford to archive) get in the way because they are visible.
—
★★★★★ always!

title: Suggestion
text:
Hello whatsapp team. Can you remove the feature of not seeing the person online ! As this feature is misleading and not good for relationships and it caused me many problems why you dont let the other person see when the person is online while chatting this was the worst update you have done. 
Also why dont you add a feature for stopping people from sending voice messages as i dont prefer voice messages. Your only focus is to add features for people to hide o  WhatsApp! You lost the main purpose of WhatsApp as it is a chatting application in which i have the right to know if the person is online or not and if they read my messages or not! Why you give a chance for people to mislead others on this application why you add deactivated for people to hide . Why dont you hide your application forever so we find a better one to use instead of an application that causes problem between couples.
